title: VR-Based Electromagnetic Induction Instructional Design for Advanced STEM Concept Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theory of electromagnetism and understanding of physical modeling
context.additional_context: Project Applying VR Simulations to Visualize Complex STEM Concepts for Real-World Problem Solving, Targeting Professionals in Specialized Fields

learning_goals: The electromagnetic induction phenomenon can be accurately replicated and explained in a 6DoF VR simulation environment
Through VR-based PBL activities, learners can analyze real-world applications of electromagnetic induction and submit reports
Experimental data on electromagnetic induction can be compared with VR/computer simulation results and analyzed according to quantitative/qualitative evaluation criteria
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
